data.content:
Danh từ
(âm nhạc)
đối âm

noun
plural -points
music
a combination of two or more melodies that are played together [count]
a two-person counterpoint [noncount]
The guitar and bass are played in counterpoint.
[count] :a melody played in combination with another
formal :something that is different from something else in usually a pleasing way [count]
The dressing is a refreshing counterpoint to the spicy chicken.
The painting is a pleasant counterpoint to his earlier works. [noncount]
The music works in counterpoint to the images on the screen.
verb
-points; -pointed; -pointing
[+ obj] formal :to put two things together in a way that shows how different they are from each other :contrast
The violence of the movie is counterpointed by/with ironic humor.
